lead_paragraph: The accusations cast a shadow over the country’s web-based finance industry, a lucrative sector that the authorities say is the subject of a growing number of fraud cases.

byline.contributor: Owen Guo contributed research from Beijing.

headline.print_headline: Online Finance Company Took $7.6 Billion in Ponzi Scheme, China Says
headline.main: Online Lender Ezubao Took $7.6 Billion in Ponzi Scheme, China Says

snippet: The accusations cast a shadow over the country’s web-based finance industry, a lucrative sector that the authorities say is the subject of a growing number of fraud cases.
abstract: Chinese authorities say Chinese online finance company Ezubao stole more than $7.6 billion from investors in Ponzi scheme; accusations cast shadow over lucrative web-based industry.
